TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataSourceView extends System.Object

summary.span: 當做所有資料來源檢視類別的基底類別，這些類別會定義資料來源控制項的功能。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all data source view classes, which define the capabilities of data source controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援資料繫結架構，可讓 Web 伺服器控制項繫結至資料以一致的方式。ASP.NET supports a data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion. 繫結至資料的 web 伺服器控制項被指資料繫結控制項，以及協助繫結，會呼叫資料來源控制項的類別。Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 資料來源控制項可以代表任何資料來源： 關聯式資料庫、 檔案、 資料流、 商務物件等等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a relational database, a file, a stream, a business object, and so on. 資料來源控制項資料繫結控制項，不論來源或基礎資料的格式一致的方式呈現資料。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 您所提供的資料來源控制項使用 ASP.NET，包括， ，和，若要執行大部分的 Web 開發工作。You use the data source controls that are provided with ASP.NET, including , , and , to perform most Web development tasks. 使用基底和類別，當您想要實作您自己自訂的資料來源控制項。You use the base and classes when you want to implement your own custom data source control. 您可以將資料來源控制項的組合視為物件和其相關聯的資料清單，稱為資料來源檢視。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the object and its associated lists of data, called data source views. 每個清單中的資料由物件。Each list of data is represented by a object. 類別是基底類別的所有資料來源檢視或清單資料來源控制項相關聯的資料。The class is the base class for all data source views, or lists of data, associated with data source controls. 資料來源檢視定義資料來源控制項的功能。Data source views define the capabilities of a data source control. 因為基礎資料儲存區包含一或多個清單的資料，資料來源控制項一律是與一個或多個具名的資料來源檢視相關聯。Because the underlying data storage contains one or more lists of data, a data source control is always associated with one or more named data source views. 使用資料來源控制項方法來列舉資料來源目前與資料來源控制項相關聯的檢視和依名稱擷取特定資料來源檢視執行個體的方法。The data source control uses the method to enumerate the data source views currently associated with the data source control and the method to retrieve a specific data source view instance by name. 所有物件支援從基礎資料來源使用的資料擷取方法。All objects support data retrieval from the underlying data source using the method. 所有檢視選擇性地都支援一組基本的作業，包括作業，例如， ，和。All views optionally support a basic set of operations, including operations such as , , and . 資料繫結控制項可以探索資料來源控制項擷取相關聯的資料來源的功能可讓您檢視使用和方法，並在設計階段或執行的階段查詢檢視。A data-bound control can discover the capabilities of a data source control by retrieving an associated data source view using the and methods, and by querying the view at design time or run time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別來建立資料來源控制項的強型別的檢視類別。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class to create a strongly typed view class for a data source control. `CsVDataSourceView`類別定義的功能`CsvDataSource`資料來源控制項，並提供資料繫結控制項，以使用以逗號分隔值 (.csv) 檔案中儲存資料的實作。The `CsVDataSourceView` class defines the capabilities of the `CsvDataSource` data source control and provides an implementation for data-bound controls to use data stored in comma-separated value (.csv) files. 如需詳細資訊`CsvDataSource`資料來源控制項，請參閱類別。For more information on the `CsvDataSource` data source control, see the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#5)]

summary.span: 取得值，指出與目前 物件關聯的 物件是否支援 作業。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the object associated with the current object supports the operation.

value.span: 如果支援該作業則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the operation is supported; otherwise, .
The base class implementation returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性反映不僅功能的資料來源控制項，但也是否適合目前執行的作業。The property reflects not only a capability of the data source control, but also whether it is currently appropriate to perform an operation. 比方說，即使資料來源檢視支援時，才一般而言，如果未設定必要的屬性或一些其他資料，作業屬性會傳回`false`，因為刪除作業將會失敗。For example, even though a data source view supports the operation in general, if a required property or some other data is not set, the property returns `false`, as a delete operation would fail. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫屬性和方法，在該類別可擴充類別。The following code example demonstrates how to override the property and the method in a class that extends the class. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性反映不僅功能的資料來源控制項，但也是否適合目前執行的作業。The property reflects not only a capability of the data source control, but also whether it is currently appropriate to perform an operation. 例如，即使資料來源控制項支援作業，如果必要的 insert 命令，或未設定一些其他資料，則屬性會傳回`false`，插入作業將會失敗。For example, even though a data source control supports the operation, if a required insert command or some other data is not set, the property returns `false`, as an insert operation would fail. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫屬性和方法，在該類別可擴充類別。The following code example demonstrates how to override the property and the method in a class that extends the class. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#9)]

summary.span: 取得值，指出與目前 物件關聯的 物件是否支援對 方法擷取的資料進行分頁。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the object associated with the current object supports paging through the data retrieved by the method.

value.span: 如果支援該作業則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the operation is supported; otherwise, .
The base class implementation returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項可以藉由新增要求分頁欄位設為物件傳遞給方法。A data-bound control can request paging by adding the field to the object passed to the method. 如果資料繫結控制項要求分頁，但屬性會傳回`false`，資料來源檢視就會擲回例外狀況。If a data-bound control requests paging, but the property returns `false`, the data source view throws an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項可以藉由新增要求資料列總數欄位設為物件傳遞給方法。A data-bound control can request a total row count by adding the field to the object passed to the method. 如果資料繫結控制項要求的總計資料列計數，但屬性會傳回`false`，資料來源檢視就會擲回例外狀況。If a data-bound control requests a total row count, but the property returns `false`, the data source view throws an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項可以要求加入排序欄位設為物件傳遞給方法。A data-bound control can request sorting by adding the field to the object passed to the method. 如果資料繫結控制要求排序，但屬性會傳回`false`，資料來源檢視就會擲回例外狀況。If a data-bound control requests sorting, but the property returns `false`, the data source view throws an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫可擴充的類別中屬性類別。The following code example demonstrates how to override the property in a class that extends the class. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler DataSourceViewChanged;
.event class System.EventHandler DataSourceViewChanged
Public Custom Event DataSourceViewChanged As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ DataSourceViewChanged;
member this.DataSourceViewChanged : EventHandler

summary.span: 當資料來源檢視已變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the data source view has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料來源檢視的變更可能是因為變更其屬性，或變更資料，因為資料來源檢視所執行的資料作業的值。The change to the data source view could be due to a change in the values of its properties, or to a change in the data due to a data operation performed by the data source view. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

span.span: An of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their original values.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，當非同步作業完成時，用來告知資料繫結控制項。

span.span: A delegate that is used to notify a data-bound control when the asynchronous operation is complete.

summary.span: 在 物件表示的資料清單上，執行非同步刪除作業。

span.span: Performs an asynchronous delete operation on the list of data that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就是所有的資料來源檢視物件的非同步資料刪除介面。The method is the asynchronous data deletion interface for all data source view objects. 方法呼叫方法使用任何`keys`和`oldValues`提供的參數值。The method calls the method using any `keys` and `oldValues` parameter values supplied. `callback`參數是委派，在資料繫結控制項傳遞至資料來源檢視，以便用來告知資料繫結控制何時作業已完成。The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the operation has completed. 此方法會使用的參數傳回的受影響的記錄和任何數目的委派所擲回的例外狀況方法。The method uses the parameters of the delegate to return the number of affected records and any exception that is thrown by the method.

span.span: The supplied is .

summary.span: 取得資料來源檢視的事件處理常式委派清單。

span.span: Gets a list of event-handler delegates for the data source view.

value.span: 事件處理常式委派的清單。

span.span: The list of event-handler delegates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的類型是，這會使用線性搜尋演算法來尋找委派的清單中的項目。This property is of type , which uses a linear search algorithm to find entries in the list of delegates. 使用大量的項目時，效率不佳的線性搜尋演算法。A linear search algorithm is inefficient when working with a large number of entries. 因此，當您有大型的清單，尋找與這個屬性的項目可能會變慢。Therefore, when you have a large list, finding entries with this property will be slow.

summary.span: 執行指定命令。

span.span: Executes the specified command.

span.span: An of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their original values.

summary.span: 在 物件表示的資料清單上，執行刪除作業。

span.span: Performs a delete operation on the list of data that the object represents.

returns.span: 從基礎資料儲存區中刪除的項目數目。

span.span: The number of items that were deleted from the underlying data storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項可以決定是否藉由擷取資料來源控制項所支援作業物件使用方法，並檢查屬性。Data-bound controls can determine whether the operation is supported by a data source control by retrieving the object using the method, and checking the property. `keys`參數表示要刪除的資料物件或資料列索引鍵。The `keys` parameter represents the object or row keys of the data to delete. 代表關聯式資料，例如資料來源控制項，`keys`參數是資料庫主索引鍵的集合。For data sources that represent relational data, such as the control, the `keys` parameter is a collection of database primary keys. 在其他情況下，`keys`參數是名稱/值組的集合，以及用來篩選資料的清單。In other scenarios, the `keys` parameter is a collection of name/value pairs and is used to filter a list of data. 會刪除任何資料比對的名稱/值組。Any data matching a name/value pair is deleted. > [!NOTE] > 類別的預設實作會擲回例外狀況。The class's default implementation is to throw a exception. 如果您擴充類別中覆寫方法，如果您的類別支援基礎資料儲存區中的要刪除。If you extend the class, override the method if your class supports deletion from the underlying data storage. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在該類別可擴充類別可以覆寫屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates how a class that extends the class can override the property and the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項可以決定是否藉由擷取資料來源控制項所支援作業物件使用方法，並檢查屬性。Data-bound controls can determine whether the operation is supported by a data source control by retrieving the object using the method, and checking the property. `values`參數是一組名稱/值組，表示資料行或欄位和要插入的對應值。The `values` parameter is a set of name/value pairs that represents data columns or fields and corresponding values to insert. > [!NOTE] > 類別的預設實作會擲回例外狀況。The class's default implementation is to throw a exception. 如果您擴充類別中覆寫方法，如果您的類別支援基礎資料儲存區的插入。If you extend the class, override the method if your class supports insertion into the underlying data storage. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在該類別可擴充類別可以覆寫屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates how a class that extends the class can override the property and the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#9)]

param.name: arguments
param.span: ，用於針對資料要求基本資料擷取以外的作業。

span.span: A that is used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.

summary.span: 從基礎資料儲存區取得資料清單。

span.span: Gets a list of data from the underlying data storage.

returns.span: 來自基礎資料儲存區的 資料清單。

span.span: An list of data from the underlying data storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫方法來擷取基礎資料存放區中的資料，並將它做為傳回物件。The method is called to retrieve data from the underlying data store and return it as an object. 所有的資料來源控制項支援從其基礎資料儲存區擷取資料，即使不支援其他作業，例如插入和排序。All data source controls support data retrieval from their underlying data storage, even if other operations such as insertion and sorting are not supported. 因為資料繫結控制項可以要求一份資料的任何時候事件或呼叫方法時，必須依需求執行資料擷取。Because a data-bound control can request a list of data at any time as a result of a event or a method call, the data retrieval must be performed on demand. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，在該類別可擴充類別。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a class that extends the class. `CsvDataSourceView`開啟的逗號分隔值 (.csv) 檔案、 加以逐行，剖析，並建立物件和資料保留在記憶體中的物件。The `CsvDataSourceView` opens a comma-separated value (.csv) file, parses it line by line, and creates a object and a object to hold the data in memory. 如果所提供的其中一個，最後套用的排序運算式物件，而物件會當做傳回執行個體。Finally, a sort expression is applied if one is supplied by the object, and the object is returned as an instance. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#6)]

span.span: Performs an update operation on the list of data that the object represents.

returns.span: 在基礎資料儲存區中更新的項目數目。

span.span: The number of items that were updated in the underlying data storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項可以決定是否作業，會使用支援資料來源控制項方法來擷取物件，並檢查值屬性。Data-bound controls can determine whether the operation is supported by a data source control by using the method to retrieve the object and checking the value of the property. `keys`參數表示要更新之資料的物件或資料列索引鍵。The `keys` parameter represents the object or row keys of the data to update. 代表關聯式資料，例如資料來源控制項，`keys`參數是資料庫主索引鍵的集合。For data sources that represent relational data, such as the control, the `keys` parameter is a collection of database primary keys. 在其他情況下，`keys`參數是名稱/值組的集合，以及用來篩選資料的清單。In other scenarios, the `keys` parameter is a collection of name/value pairs and is used to filter a list of data. 比對的名稱/值組的任何資料的中找到的值來更新`values`參數，這是一組名稱/值組，其代表現有的欄位或資料行的新值。Any data matching a name/value pair is updated with the values found in the `values` parameter, which is a set of name/value pairs that represents new values for existing fields or columns. > [!NOTE] > 類別的預設實作會擲回例外狀況。The class's default implementation is to throw a exception. 如果您擴充類別中覆寫方法，如果您的類別支援基礎資料儲存區中的資料更新。If you extend the class, override the method if your class supports updating data in the underlying data storage. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在該類別可擴充類別可以覆寫屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates how a class that extends the class can override the property and the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#10)]

summary.span: 在 物件表示的資料清單上，執行非同步插入作業。

span.span: Performs an asynchronous insert operation on the list of data that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就是所有的資料來源檢視物件的非同步資料插入介面。The method is the asynchronous data insertion interface for all data source view objects. 方法呼叫方法使用任何`values`提供。The method calls the method using any `values` supplied. `callback`參數是委派，在資料繫結控制項傳遞至資料來源檢視，以便用來告知資料繫結控制何時作業已完成。The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the operation has completed. 此方法會使用的參數傳回的受影響的記錄和任何數目的委派所擲回的例外狀況方法呼叫。The method uses the parameters of the delegate to return the number of affected records and any exception that is thrown by the method call.

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件資料的 。

span.span: An that contains event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基礎資料來源已變更，並應該重新繫結控制項，並執行任何必要的工作，方法會告知資料繫結控制項。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and perform any necessary work. 一般而言，資料來源檢視的屬性已經變更時呼叫方法。Typically, the method is called when a property of the data source view has changed. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Called by the method to compare the capabilities requested for an operation against those that the view supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可由資料來源檢視來檢查每個資料繫結控制項，表示所要求的功能物件傳遞給方法，並比較它的功能支援的資料原始碼 檢視中。The method is used by the data source view to examine each of the capabilities requested by a data-bound control, represented by the object passed to the method, and compare it to the capabilities supported by the data source view.

span.span: The data source view does not support the data source capability specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就是所有的資料來源檢視物件的非同步資料修改介面。The method is the asynchronous data modification interface for all data source view objects. 方法呼叫方法使用任何`keys`， `values`，和`oldValues`提供的參數值。The method calls the method using any `keys`, `values`, and `oldValues` parameter values supplied. `callback`參數是委派，在資料繫結控制項傳遞至資料來源檢視，以便用來告知資料繫結控制何時作業已完成。The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the operation has completed. 此方法會使用的參數傳回的受影響的記錄和任何數目的委派所擲回的例外狀況呼叫。The method uses the parameters of the delegate to return the number of affected records and any exception that is thrown by the call.
